text: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China Limited (ICBC; ) is the largest bank in the world by profit and market capitalization. It is one of China's 'Big Four' state-owned commercial banks. The other three banks are Bank of China, Agricultural Bank of China, and China Construction Bank. It was founded on January 1, 1984. At first it was a private company. It had assets of RMB 12.55 trillion (US$1.9 trillion). It also had over 18,000 outlets including 106 overseas branches and agents globally.China's biggest bank goes to market, Financial Times In 2013, it was ranked number 1 on Forbes Global 2000 list of world's biggest public companies. ==References== ==Other websites== *Financial Reports *Industrial and Commercial Bank of China *Industrial and Commercial Bank of China Category:1984 establishments in Asia Category:Banks of Asia Category:1980s establishments in China
title: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China
